lead_paragraph: Crimes including murder and rape are up across the board in Los Angeles, but the city is still far less violent than it has been in the past, city leaders said.

headline.main: California: Los Angeles Reports Increases in Crime
headline.print_headline: California: Los Angeles Reports Increases In Crime

snippet: Crimes including murder and rape are up across the board in Los Angeles, but the city is still far less violent than it has been in the past, city leaders said.
